org.metacsp.framework

Class BinaryConstraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.metacsp.framework.Constraint
      • org.metacsp.framework.BinaryConstraint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CardinalConstraint, QualitativeAllenIntervalConstraint, RCCConstraint, SimpleDistanceConstraint

    public abstract class BinaryConstraint
extends Constraint
    This is the basic abstract class for representing binary constraints (i.e., constraints whose scope is of size 2).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
